title: Targeted Design Strategies for Highly Activated Carbon Cloth Cathode/Anode to Construct Flexible and Cuttable Sodium Ion Capacitors with All-Woven-Structure
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02578D, Paper
Ying-Ying Wang, Zhong-Yuan Wang, Yu-Juan Xu, Weihua Chen, Guosheng Shao, Bao-Hua Hou
Carbon cloth (CC) is a promising flexible substrate to construct flexible electrodes. However, commercial CC suffers from high price, large dead weight/volume and poor electrochemical activity, severely affecting the energy/power...
